title: Face watch transformer
summary: A beautiful watch face for moto 360 watch compatible with all round displays.
description: - Watchmaker 3.3.3 free version needed to load the watch face Download here : http://goo.gl/FMxUfYA beautiful watch face for moto 360 watch (compatible with LG watch too) - Watch face compatible with all round displays.Transforms its screen by tapping in the center into stunning weather/compass and phone battery indicator.Changes its hand color from yellow in the morning to shocking orange in the afternoon, and into beautiful blue at night!
descriptionHTML:
- Watchmaker 3.3.3 free version needed to load the watch face Download here : http://goo.gl/FMxUfY
A beautiful watch face for moto 360 watch (compatible with LG watch too) - Watch face compatible with all round displays.
Transforms its screen by tapping in the center into stunning weather/compass and phone battery indicator.
Changes its hand color from yellow in the morning to shocking orange in the afternoon, and into beautiful blue at night!
comments: Great idea I like the idea but the graphics are not very good for the hands etc.
recentChanges: Two more stunning screens : Calendar Heart rate and steps count and StopWatch
